1. What is the default option, if I do not choose the custom configuration?

2. How do I access the database table in HCP?
You can access the contents of database table from HanaXS using the following procedure.
Log on to HanaXS using the following URL:
Provide your username (I number) and password (The first time password is Init1234).
In the left pane, choose New SQL Editor.
Enter the SQL commands to view the contents in the table.
For example, Enter the following SQL command, Select * from SAP_PIA_USAGECLOUD.<Table_Name> to view the contents of the table.
3. Which are the relevant database tables for the application I registered?
A. If you have registered the application with default configuration, then use following database tables:
com.sap.pia.usagecloud.APPLICATION: This table stores the application registration details.
com.sap.pia.usagecloud.COMMONFACTS: This table stores the Usage Tracking details for the registered application.
B. If you have registered the application with custom configuration, then use the following database tables:
com.sap.pia.usagecloud.APPLICATION: This table stores the application registration details.
com.sap.pia.usagecloud.COMMONFACTS: This table stores the Usage Tracking details for the registered application.
com.sap.pia.usagecloud.UT_<Application ID>: This table stores the relevant details of custom configuration for the registered application.

5. How can I enable my colleagues to access the database table and Lumira visualizations?
You can provide the database table and Lumira visualization access to your peer user by using the following procedure:
Log on to HanaXS using the following URL:
Provide you username(I number) and password(The first time password is Init1234)
In the right pane, Expand Users section.
Select a relevant user.
Choose Object Privileges.
Choose the + icon to add an SQL object.
Enter SAP_PIA_USAGECLOUD.
Select ALL to grant the privileges to the peer user.
Choose Save.
